hero.headline: Never lose another warranty claim
hero.subheadline: Upload receipts. Track warranties. Generate claim packets. Cyncro uses AI to extract purchase details and reminds you before coverage expires.

steps.title: Upload or forward
steps.description: Drop a photo of your receipt, forward email confirmations, or import PDFs. Our AI reads them instantly.

steps.title: AI extracts details
steps.description: We automatically pull out merchant, item, price, and warranty length. Review and confirm with one tap.

steps.title: Track & get reminded
steps.description: See all your warranties in one place. Get notified before they expire so you never miss a claim window.

claimPacket.headline: One-click claim packets
claimPacket.description: When you need to file a warranty claim, Cyncro generates a complete packet with your original receipt, purchase details, and warranty terms. Download as PDF or share directly with the merchant.

security.headline: Bank-level security
security.description: Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We never sell your information, and you can delete everything at any time.

finalCta.headline: Ready to protect your purchases?
finalCta.description: Join thousands of people who never miss a warranty claim. Start free, upgrade when you need more.
